snippet: Japan-based Koito Manufacturing Company will plead guilty to two counts of conspiring to fix auto parts prices and will pay $56.6 million in fines, the Justice Department said.
lead_paragraph: Japan-based Koito Manufacturing Company will plead guilty to two counts of conspiring to fix auto parts prices and will pay $56.6 million in fines, the Justice Department said.

headline.main: Auto Parts Maker Pleads Guilty to Price-Fixing
